name: 3-ingredient Cajun BBQ Ribs Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: baby back ribs, cajun seasoning, BBQ sauce
recipeInstructionSteps: Rub the Cajun seasoning evenly over the top and bottom of the ribs.
Bake for 2 hours, until ribs are tender.
Brush the BBQ sauce evenly over the top and the sides.
Bake for an additional 15 minutes, until the sauce is bubbly and caramelized.
Serve with the extra BBQ sauce!
